attributes.action: Turn Rhos Street Community Primary School (The Old One) into a McDonalds
attributes.additional_details: It's Has Been Abandoned Since 2019 So Making A McDonald's Out Of It Is An Excellent Idea

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.
